InstructionData.Title: Combustion Centrifuge Example
InstructionData.Author: SMiLeY.NET
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias centrifuge db alias currentRPM r0 alias previousRPM r3 alias RPMdelta r4 alias currentStress r2 alias currentSetting r1 alias minSetting r5 alias minAdjustment r6 alias adjustmentMultiple r7
# Threshold at which LowRPM switches to HighRPM mode # Recommended: O2/H2: 10 NO2/H2: 200 define TRANSITIONRPM 200 # Minimal throttle for specific RPM levels. # Speeds up starts by not dropping to 0% at high RPM # Every 0-400 RPM 0%, 400-800 10% etc. define MINRPMSTEP 400
# May be tweaked for custom fuel mixes or whatever define CRITICALSTRESS 50 define HIGHSTRESS 25 define LOWSTRESS 5
move currentRPM 0 move previousRPM 0 move RPMdelta 0 move currentStress 0 move currentSetting 0 move minSetting 0 move minAdjustment 0 move adjustmentMultiple 0
mainloop: min currentSetting currentSetting 100 max currentSetting currentSetting 0 move previousRPM currentRPM l currentStress centrifuge Stress l currentRPM centrifuge Rpm move RPMdelta currentRPM sub RPMdelta RPMdelta previousRPM blt currentRPM TRANSITIONRPM lowstage bgt currentRPM TRANSITIONRPM highstage sleep 1 j mainloop
# Low RPM mode - briefly pulse 10% throttle lowstage: move currentSetting 0 move minSetting 0 move minAdjustment 0 s centrifuge Throttle 10 s centrifuge CombustionLimiter 10 sleep 1 s centrifuge Throttle 0 s centrifuge CombustionLimiter 0 sleep 2 j mainloop
# High RPM mode - stress-based regulation highstage: div adjustmentMultiple currentRPM MINRPMSTEP move minSetting 0 jal adjustthrottle # Stall recovery - RPM dropping, add throttle blt RPMdelta -0.25 highstageupfast bgt currentStress CRITICALSTRESS highstagedownfast bgt currentStress HIGHSTRESS highstagedownslow blt currentStress LOWSTRESS highstageupslow sleep 1 j mainloop
highstageupfast: add currentSetting currentSetting 10 max currentSetting currentSetting minSetting s centrifuge Throttle currentSetting s centrifuge CombustionLimiter currentSetting sleep 2 j mainloop
highstageupslow: add currentSetting currentSetting 10 max currentSetting currentSetting minSetting s centrifuge Throttle currentSetting s centrifuge CombustionLimiter currentSetting sleep 8 j mainloop
highstagedownfast: sub currentSetting currentSetting 10 max currentSetting currentSetting minSetting s centrifuge Throttle currentSetting s centrifuge CombustionLimiter currentSetting sleep 2 j mainloop
highstagedownslow: sub currentSetting currentSetting 10 max currentSetting currentSetting minSetting s centrifuge Throttle currentSetting s centrifuge CombustionLimiter currentSetting sleep 8 j mainloop
adjustthrottle: bgt adjustmentMultiple 1 addminthrottle j ra
addminthrottle: add minSetting minSetting 10 sub adjustmentMultiple adjustmentMultiple 1 j adjustthrottle
